mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_name, m_pw, m_Addr, m_tel, m_birth, m_profile) Values (#{M_Id}, #{M_Name}, #{M_Pw}, #{M_Addr}, #{M_Tel}, #{M_Birth}, #{M_Profile})
insert into farmer (f_id, f_name, f_pw, f_Addr, f_tel, f_birth, f_profile, f_auth) Values (#{F_Id}, #{F_Name}, #{F_Pw}, #{F_Addr}, #{F_Tel}, #{F_Birth}, #{F_Profile}, #{F_Auth})
mapper.select: select * from member where m_id = #{M_Id} and m_pw = #{M_Pw}
